answers.answer: Bc u drink sugar for the glucose (sugar) test. If you have sugar built up already then down more sugar on top you can flag for gestational diabetes falsely
Np. I was told to fast for 12hrs. Couldnt eat at all, not just avoid sugar. Lucky u get to eat lol imagine cravings and not being able to eat!

question: Have a dr. Appt tomorrow for glucose test ? Why is it recommend that u can't eat sweet stuff before taking the test ?
title: question
